posts.post_title: 19th century Mayo Cut Plug Tobacco tin for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Keith
Hello all,

I have an old black and gold Mayo Cut Plug tobacco tin for sale.  It is in pretty good shape with some minor dings, etc.  Email me with offers to buy or trade.  My email is kjjavic@aol.com.  If looking to trade, I collect football memoribilia, and t206s and t205s.
thanks
Keith

posts.post_title: 19th century Mayo Cut Plug Tobacco tin for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: keith
I only received 1 email, and I responded to it yesterday.  Are you emailing me at kjjavic@aol.com?  As I stated in the email, I just settled on the sale of my house, and as you can guess, I had a very hectic weekend moving out.  Your tin went out via prioirity mail on Wednesday, and you should recieve it anyday.
Sorry for the delay.  I should have emailed you on Wednesday after I sent it but it slipped my mind.  And I honestly only received 1 email from you, and to that one I replied immediately.
